Package com.paigegoldhagen.starbower

Class ResourceHandler

java.lang.Object
com.paigegoldhagen.starbower.ResourceHandler
public class ResourceHandler extends Object
Loading resource files, creating loaded file classes and registering custom resources.

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourceHandler

      public ResourceHandler()

  • Method Details

    • getDatabaseQueries

      public static Queries getDatabaseQueries() throws IOException
      Read from the QueryFiles CSV to get the query file names and get the query string using the file name. Add query name/string pairs to a list.
      Returns:
      a Queries class with a list of query name/string pairs
      Throws:
      IOException - a resource folder/file could not be found or read

    • getAppImages

      public static AppImages getAppImages() throws IOException
      Load the Images from the FileHandler class and set the trayImage Image. Create a new AppImages class.
      Returns:
      an AppImages class with a tray Image and an Image list
      Throws:
      IOException - a resource folder/file could not be found or read

    • registerCustomFonts

      public static void registerCustomFonts() throws IOException, FontFormatException
      Read from the FontFiles CSV to get the font file names. Get the input stream for each font and register the font in the graphics environment.
      Throws:
      IOException - a resource folder/file could not be found or read
      FontFormatException - the font format type is incompatible

    • getDropdownList

      public static List<Dropdown> getDropdownList()
      Get the input stream from the DropdownData CSV and map the data to the Dropdown class.
      Returns:
      a list of Dropdown classes
